password.question: how to reset password
password.answer: You can reset your password at https://company.com/reset-password. If you need help, contact IT support at helpdesk@company.com.

vacation.question: vacation policy
vacation.answer: Employees accrue 15 vacation days per year. You can request time off through the HR portal at https://hr.company.com.

it_support.question: it support
it_support.answer: For IT issues, please email helpdesk@company.com or call extension 5555. Emergency support is available 24/7.

expense.question: expense report
expense.answer: Submit expense reports through the finance portal at https://finance.company.com. Receipts are required for expenses over $25.

wifi.question: wifi
wifi.answer: The office WiFi network is 'Company-Guest'. Password: 'Welcome123'. For secure access, use 'Company-Secure' with your domain credentials.

meeting_rooms.question: meeting rooms
meeting_rooms.answer: You can book meeting rooms through the Outlook calendar system. Large conference rooms require manager approval.

hr.question: hr contact
hr.answer: Reach HR at hr@company.com or visit their office on the 3rd floor. Office hours: 9 AM - 5 PM, Monday to Friday.

software.question: software request
software.answer: For new software installations, submit a ticket to the IT helpdesk. Please include business justification and required specifications.
